{{cpp/filesystem/filesystem_error/title|path1|path2}}
{{cpp/filesystem/filesystem_error/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | since=c++17 | 1=
const std::filesystem::path&amp; path1() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl | since=c++17 | 1=
const std::filesystem::path&amp; path2() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

返回存储于异常对象中的路径。

===参数===
（无）

===返回值===
到构造函数所存储的 {{tt|path}} 形参的副本的引用。

===示例===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cstdio&gt;
#include &lt;filesystem&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    const std::filesystem::path old_p{std::tmpnam(nullptr)},
                                new_p{std::tmpnam(nullptr)};
    try {
        std::filesystem::rename(old_p, new_p); // 因为 old_p 不存在而抛出
    }
    catch(std::filesystem::filesystem_error const&amp; ex) {
        std::cout
            &lt;&lt; "what():  " &lt;&lt; ex.what() &lt;&lt; '\n'
            &lt;&lt; "path1(): " &lt;&lt; ex.path1() &lt;&lt; '\n'
            &lt;&lt; "path2(): " &lt;&lt; ex.path2() &lt;&lt; '\n';
    }
}
| p=true
| output=
what():  filesystem error: cannot rename: No such file or directory [/tmp/fileIzzRLB] [/tmp/fileiUDWlV]
path1(): "/tmp/fileIzzRLB"
path2(): "/tmp/fileiUDWlV"
}}
